item.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Old DNS server upgrade
item.description:
Nov 8, 00:22 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Nov 7, 23:30 UTC
Update - The current maintenance is still in progress. We will inform you when it's completed.

Nov 7, 22:01 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Nov 7, 18:42 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 07/11/2022 22:00 UTC
End time : 07/11/2022 23:30 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : We are replacing hardware for an old DNS server (91.121.161.184).
Some old modems are still using it, as they are the default value in the firmware.
Workaround : The backup servers are available, so you most likely won't see a difference. If you do, please consider changing the DNS servers.

If your modem are still using this server, we strongly advise you to move to the newer one :
- dns1.isp.ovh.net
91.121.61.147
2001:41d0:304:1::2

- dns2.isp.ovh.net
87.98.149.171
2001:41d0:304:1::1

- dns3.isp.ovh.net
91.121.58.181
2001:41d0:304:1::2
